trans-unit.source: Represents a specialized text run that can be used to modify properties of text runs within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Representa um especializado sequência de texto que pode ser usado para modificar as propriedades de texto é executado dentro de seu escopo.

trans-unit.source: The scope of the TextModifier extends to the next matching <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment> text run, or to the next <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph>.
trans-unit.target: O escopo de TextModifier estende para o próximo <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment>texto executado, ou para o próximo <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment> de correspondência

trans-unit.source: Note that TextModifier objects can be nested.
trans-unit.target: Observe que os objetos TextModifier podem ser aninhados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> specifies the direction of content flow for text and user interface (UI) elements, and can be either <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>Especifica a direção do fluxo de conteúdo de texto e o usuário (UI) de elementos da interface e podem ser um <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>ou <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> </xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection></xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored unless the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.HasDirectionalEmbedding%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é ignorado, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.HasDirectionalEmbedding%2A>propriedade retorna `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.HasDirectionalEmbedding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"></xref> supports <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref> for the current scope of text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"> </xref> dá suporte a <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref> para o escopo atual do texto.

trans-unit.source: When the return value is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.FlowDirection%2A> property to determine the direction of content flow for the current scope of text.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor de retorno é `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>usa o <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.FlowDirection%2A>propriedade para determinar a direção do fluxo de conteúdo para o escopo atual do texto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.FlowDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"></xref> supports <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref> for the current scope of text; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"> </xref> dá suporte a <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref> para o escopo atual de texto; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> for a text run.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> </xref> para um sequência de texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> for a text run, or the return value of ModifyProperties for a nested text modifier.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> </xref> para uma sequência de texto ou o valor de retorno de ModifyProperties para um modificador de texto aninhadas.

trans-unit.source: The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref>, subject to further modification by <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"></xref> objects at outer scopes.
trans-unit.target: O real <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> </xref> a ser usado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"> </xref>, sujeito à modificação adicional por <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"> </xref> objetos em escopos externos.
